title: Samples, 1989-80-21-a/e, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 17 cm [6 3/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 63 cm [25"] Selvedge one side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 24 cm [9.5"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 31 cm [12"]  Cut both sides.
c. Warp: 23.5 cm [9 1/4"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 31.5 cm [12.5"] Cut both sides.
d. Warp: 14 cm [5.5"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 31.5 cm [12.5"] Selvedge one side, cut other side.
e. Warp: 13.5 cm [5 1/4"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft:  31.5 cm [12.5"] Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. rust color ground with blue/grey and metallic gold motif
b. gold color ground with blue/grey and metallic gold motif
c. dark red ground with blue/grey and metallic gold motif
d. same as above
e. green ground with rust color and metallic gold motif
